clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in left lower lobe.
Small pneumothorax on the left lower lobe side.
Enlarged lymph nodes in left lower lobe, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Focal consolidation in left lower lobe with air bronchogram.
Patchy ground-glass opacities noted in left lower lobe.
recommendations: Further evaluation with PET-CT recommended if malignancy suspected.
